Clumpy API¶

This is the full API documentation of the clumpy toolbox.

clumpy.definition: Definition¶

Elements definition

Layer¶

definition.LandUseCoverLayer([name, time, …])

Defines a Land Use Cover (LUC) layer.

definition.FeatureLayer([name, time, path, …])

Defines a feature layer.

Case¶

definition.Case(params)

A land use and cover change model case.

clumpy.allocation: Allocation¶

Allocation blabla

allocation.generalized_allocation(P, list_v)

Generalized allocation rejection process.

clumpy.metrics: Metrics¶

The clumpy.metrics module completes sklearn.metrics.

Scores¶

metrics.compute_a(y)

Computes log score parameter a.

metrics.log_score(y_true, y_prob, a[, b])

Log score

Scorers¶

metrics.log_scorer(a[, b])

make log scorer.

metrics.under_sampling_log_scorer(beta, id_u, a)

log scorer

clumpy.integer: Integer¶

Fonctions d’intégration

integer.empirical_distribution_function(X)

Empirical distribution function of the samples X.

integer.cumulative_distribution_function(f, X)

Computes cumulative distribution function through Monte Carlo method.

clumpy.resampling: Resampling¶

clumpy.resampling is a module which provides helps to compute resampling parameters.

Under sampling¶

Under Sampling

resampling.under_sampling.compute_sampling_strategy(y)

Compute sampling strategy

resampling.under_sampling.correct_probabilities(P, …)

Correct probabilities estimated through an undersampling.

clumpy.scenario: Scenario¶

scenario blabla

scenario.adjust_probabilities(P, f)

adjust probabilities

clumpy.resampling: utils¶

The clumpy.utils module completes sklearn.utils.

utils.human_size(s)

return size in a human readable form.

utils.ndarray_suitable_integer_type(a)

Convert a ndarray in a suitable integer type
